price: 31. Behalve Iblies – hij weigerde onder de knielenden te zijn.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
